title: The Mountain
subtitle: Journey to the Highndry
description: The Travellers journey across Walston's wilderness to Mount Salbarii, facing natural hazards and wildlife before finally reaching their prize - the stranded scout ship.
dramatic_purpose: Climax begins - challenges intensify, goal within reach
hazards: Thin atmosphere - filter masks required outside settlements
narrator_notes: The journey should feel earned. The Highndry has been waiting in that crater for months. When the Travellers finally see it, there should be a moment of triumph - before they realize the work ahead.
